svg.content:
<mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.15; rv:132.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/132.0" version="24.8.6"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="dZT4-ucdci6CpXlB4ax3"> <mxGraphModel dx="1590" dy="438" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="1" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-1" value="three standard AGM operations" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontFamily=Comic Sans MS;fontSize=14;horizontal=1;rotation=270;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-920" y="260" width="230" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-2" value="1. expansion" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontFamily=Comic Sans MS;fontSize=14;labelBackgroundColor=#FFCE9F;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-740" y="167.5" width="80" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-3" value="<div>2. contraction<br></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontFamily=Comic Sans MS;labelBackgroundColor=#FFCE9F;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="30" y="290" width="80" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-4" value="<div style="font-size: 14px;">3. revision<br style="font-size: 14px;"></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontFamily=Comic Sans MS;labelBackgroundColor=#FFCE9F;fontSize=14;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-740" y="368" width="80" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-8" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-6" target="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-7"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-9" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-6" target="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-7"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-10" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-6" target="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-7"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-12" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-6" target="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-11"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="-260" y="245" /> <mxPoint x="-260" y="245" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-27" value="<div align="left">1. Decide whether the input `p` should be accepted or rejected. (<font face="Times New Roman">评价的过程</font>)</div><div align="left"><hr>2. If `p` was accepte, revise by `p`.<br></div>" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];fontFamily=Times New Roman;" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-12"> <mxGeometry x="-0.4658" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-61" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-28" value="for belief set" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];fontFamily=Times New Roman;" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-12"> <mxGeometry x="-0.8744" y="-2" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="7" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-6" value="<div>semi-revision `K?p`</div><div><hr><font face="Times New Roman">non-priotity</font><br></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f9f7ed;strokeColor=#36393d;fontFamily=Comic Sans MS;align=left;fontSize=14;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-531" y="215" width="141" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-7" value="<div>screerned revision</div><div><hr><font color="#660000">core beliefs</font><br></div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="160" width="110" height="45" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-11" value="<div>credibility-limited revision</div><div><hr>credible sentences<br></div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="20" y="290" width="150" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-13" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-11" target="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-11"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-16" value="<div style="font-size: 14px;">Updating</div><div style="font-size: 14px;"><hr style="font-size: 14px;"><font style="font-size: 14px;" face="Times New Roman">time index:</font> `&lt;p,t_0&gt;`<br style="font-size: 14px;"></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=top;fontFamily=Comic Sans MS;fillColor=#f9f7ed;strokeColor=#36393d;fontSize=14;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-540" y="510" width="140" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-17" value="<div style="font-size: 14px;"><font face="Comic Sans MS" style="font-size: 14px;">Consolidation</font>&nbsp;&nbsp; `A! =A\div  ot`<br style="font-size: 14px;"></div><div style="font-size: 14px;"><hr style="font-size: 14px;">only for belief base<br style="font-size: 14px;"></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontFamily=Times New Roman;fontSize=14;align=left;fillColor=#f9f7ed;strokeColor=#36393d;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-540" y="400" width="181" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-19" value="(belief set `K` / belief base `A`)" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontFamily=Times New Roman;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-760" y="110" width="180" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-20" value="`K+p=Cn(K\cup {p})`" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=10;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-730" y="200" width="110" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-21" value="`A+^' p=A\cup {p}`" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=10;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-730" y="220" width="100" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-22" value="<div>`K  ot p` : the remainder set</div><div>`gamma`: a selection function<br></div><div>`K \div p= igcap \gamma (K  ot p)`</div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=10;horizontal=1;fontFamily=Times New Roman;fontStyle=0" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-730" y="290" width="170" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-23" value="<div>Levi indentity:</div><div>`K \ast p = (K \div 
eg p) + p`<br></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontFamily=Times New Roman;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-730" y="398" width="170" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-24" value="<div>Internal revision:<br></div><div>`A \ast p = (A \div 
eg p) +^' p` <br></div><div><br></div><div>External revision:<br></div><div>`A \ast p = (A +^' p) \div 
eg p`</div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=#FFCCE6;textShadow=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-730" y="450" width="180" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-25" value="" style="endArrow=none;dashed=1;html=1;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-560" y="880" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-560" y="40" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-26" value="`A?p = (A +^' p)!`" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;labelBorderColor=#FFCCCC;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-531" y="290" width="110" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Hc7NWiiw-2Sq7Oy6wgzb-29" value="2. contraction" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontFamily=Comic Sans MS;fontSize=14;labelBackgroundColor=#FFCE9F;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-740" y="260" width="100" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.div: 1. Decide whether the input should be accepted or rejected. (评价的过程)

switch.text: 1. Decide whether the input `p` should be accepted or rejected. (评价的过程)...

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
